description.en:
In the workshops the students are given essential knowledge and skills how
to support a preschool-aged multilingual child with language support
description.et: Praktikumide käigus antakse üliõpilastele  teadmisi ning oskusi muukeelse lapse keeleliseks toetamiseks.

objectives.en:
The objective of the subject: to give preparation for working with a multilingual
child and for teaching Estonian as a second language in preschool.
objectives.et: Anda üliõpilastele ettevalmistus tööks muukeelse lapsega  ja eesti keele kui teise keele toetamiseks koolieelses lasteasutuses.

learning_outcomes.en: Student who has passed the subject:
- has acquired the main theoretical principles of linguistic support of Estonian as a second language;
learning_outcomes.et: - on omandanud eesti keele kui teise keele keelelise toetamise peamised teoreetilised põhimõtted ;

learning_outcomes.en: - is able to take into account the specifics of a multilingual learning environment;
- is able to analyze activities aimed at linguistic support of a multilingual child.
learning_outcomes.et: -  oskab analüüsida muukeelse lapse keelelisele toetamisele suunatud tegevusi.
